verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> when they <S%H7126>offered<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H4191>died;<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1696>Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> that he <S%H935>come<s%> not at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6256>times<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat, <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H727>ark;<s%> that he <S%H4191>die<s%> not: for I will <S%H7200>appear<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> on the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat.

<S%H2063>Thus<s%> shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place: with a <S%H1121>young<s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and a <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

He shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H3801>coat,<s%> and he shall <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4370>breeches<s%> on his <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and shall be <S%H2296>girded<s%> with a <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H73>girdle,<s%> and with the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H4701>turban<s%> shall he be <S%H6801>attired:<s%> <S%H1992>these<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments;<s%> therefore shall he <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and so <S%H3847>put<s%> them on.

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>kids<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats<s%> for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H352>ram<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> his <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, <S%H834>which<s%> is for himself, and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself, and for his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>goats,<s%> and <S%H5975>present<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5414>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8163>goats;<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> on <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5927>fell,<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> him for a <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering.

But the <S%H8163>goat,<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H5927>fell<s%> to be the <S%H5799>scapegoat,<s%> shall be <S%H5975>presented<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> with him, and to let him <S%H7971>go<s%> for a <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, <S%H834>which<s%> is for himself, and shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself, and for his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and shall <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering <S%H834>which<s%> is for himself:

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H4289>censer<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H784>burning<s%> <S%H1513>coals<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H2651>hands<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H1851>beaten<s%> <S%H1851>small,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil:<s%>

And he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H7004>incense<s%> on the <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> of the <S%H7004>incense<s%> may <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat that is on the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> that he <S%H4191>die<s%> not:

And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it with his <S%H676>finger<s%> on the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat <S%H6924>eastward;<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat shall he <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

Then shall he <S%H7819>kill<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, that is for the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H1004>within<s%> the <S%H6532>veil,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> with that <S%H1818>blood<s%> as he <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> it on the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat, and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3727>mercy<s%> seat:

And he shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, because of the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and because of their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sins:<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> shall he <S%H6213>do<s%> for the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> that <S%H7931>remains<s%> <S%H854>among<s%> them in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of their <S%H2932>uncleanness.<s%>

And there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> when he <S%H935>goes<s%> in to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H3318>come<s%> out, and have made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself, and for his <S%H1004>household,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out to the <S%H4196>altar<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for it; and shall <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bullock,<s%> and of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

And he shall <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on it with his <S%H676>finger<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> it, and <S%H6942>hallow<s%> it from the <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And when he has made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H3722>reconciling<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the congregation, and the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> he shall <S%H7126>bring<s%> the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H8163>goat:<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> his <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H2416>live<s%> <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> him <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sins,<s%> <S%H5414>putting<s%> them on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and shall <S%H7971>send<s%> him away by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of a <S%H6261>fit<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> into the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%>

And the <S%H8163>goat<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> on him <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> not <S%H1509>inhabited:<s%> and he shall let <S%H7971>go<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the congregation, and shall <S%H6584>put<s%> off the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H3847>put<s%> on when he <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and shall <S%H5117>leave<s%> them <S%H8033>there:<s%>

And he shall <S%H7364>wash<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with <S%H4325>water<s%> in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H6213>offer<s%> his <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering, and the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> offering of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for himself, and for the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering shall he <S%H6999>burn<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And he that let <S%H7971>go<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> for the <S%H5799>scapegoat<s%> shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And the <S%H6499>bullock<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, and the <S%H8163>goat<s%> for the <S%H2403>sin<s%> offering, <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> was <S%H935>brought<s%> in to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, shall one <S%H3318>carry<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp;<s%> and they shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> their <S%H5785>skins,<s%> and their <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and their <S%H6569>dung.<s%>

And he that <S%H8313>burns<s%> them shall <S%H3526>wash<s%> his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7364>bathe<s%> his <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> he shall <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And this shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> to you: that in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> at <S%H3605>all,<s%> whether it be one of your <S%H249>own<s%> <S%H249>country,<s%> or a <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojournes<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you:

For on that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the priest make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for you, to <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> you, that you may be <S%H2891>clean<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
It shall be a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> to you, and you shall <S%H6031>afflict<s%> your <S%H5315>souls,<s%> by a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he shall <S%H4886>anoint,<s%> and <S%H834>whom<s%> he shall <S%H3027>consecrate<s%> to minister in the <S%H3547>priest's<s%> office in his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H8478>stead,<s%> shall make the <S%H3722>atonement,<s%> and shall <S%H3847>put<s%> on the <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H899>clothes,<s%> even the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments:<s%>

And he shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and he shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the congregation, and for the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and he shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> shall be an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> to you, to make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H2403>sins<s%> <S%H259>once<s%> a <S%H8141>year.<s%> And he <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>
